name: about_you
label: About You
help: First off let's find out who you are. If completing a form like this is difficult for you to manage please get in touch via applications@thecodersguild.org.uk and we will arrange an alternative way for you to apply.

email.label: Email
email.help: don't worry, we're not going to spam you
email.required_message: A valid email address is required.

phone_number.label: Phone Number
phone_number.help: If we need any clarification with your application it is quicker for us to text you.

pronouns.label: Pronouns
pronouns.help: Help us to address you properly

where_are_you_looking_to_work.label: Where would you be looking to work?

opportunity.label: Which vacancy are you applying for?
opportunity.help: If you have come here via the .gov find an apprenticeship site or a job board the vacancy will be for a specific organisation - if not applicable just leave this blank

name: application
label: Application Questions
help: This course is not right for everyone - these questions will help us make a judgement on whether this pilot course is the right learning path for you. If you are unsuccessful we will still be able to point you to other resources and programmes. Please fill out the questions to the best of your ability.

why_did_user_apply.label: What has made you apply for this Apprenticeship Position?
why_did_user_apply.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

why_is_user_a_fit.label: Why do you think you would be a good fit for The Coders Guild?
why_is_user_a_fit.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

what_is_user_passionate.label: What is something outside of your work that you are passionate about?
what_is_user_passionate.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

time_organised.label: Can you tell us about a time when you have had to be organised and how that has paid off?
time_organised.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

self_taught.label: Please give us an example of something you have taught yourself
self_taught.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

name: demographic_data
label: Demographic Data
help: You don't have to tell us this stuff but the DfE (who are paying for the course) have to ask it. All of this data will be held securely and will only be used for anoymous data processsing and evaluation. Feel free to leave out any questions you don't feel like answering and please don't let it put you off. For more details please see our privacy policy.

help: This course is Gov funded and FREE for you - so obviously there is paperwork for us to complete. We need this information to be able to progress your application so please don't leave any out.
